column1: Prakash Reddy a.k.a. Om Sai Prakash is a Telugu and Kannada film director and producer. Born in Phirangipuram in Guntur district of Andhra Pradesh
column2: he started as an assistant to Kodi Ramakrishna and then charted his own course in direction. He directed Maa Inti Aadapoduchu
column10: etc. in Telugu.  He had a trademark of directing films with sentimental and devotional themes.

column6: were blockbusters in the Kannada film industry. He is married to Rajamma. His son Sai Krishna works as a publicity designer and is going to debut as a director.
